game.name: Legends of Savvarah: Flowers and Scorpions
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.
